price: 26. Aan Allah behoort wat in de hemelen en op aarde is. Waarlijk, Allah, Hij is rijke, de meest prijzenswaardige.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
